sections.Known Lords of the Iron Islands:
* Lord {[[Vickon Greyjoy]]}, elected by the [[ironborn]] as Lord of the Iron Islands after the death of King [[Harren Hoare]] during the [[War of Conquest|Targaryen Conquest]].
* Lord [[Balon Greyjoy]], the last holder before rebelling against the Iron Throne.
sections.In the books: The Iron Islands is one of the two constituent regions of the [[Seven Kingdoms]], alongside [[Dorne]], whose rulers aren't "Lords Paramount". While the rulers of Dorne hold the title of "Prince", the rulers of the Iron Islands are merely lords.
